column8: http://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2017...engthening-pas/The StarThursday, 9 March 2017Liow: DAP is to be blamed for strengthening PASPETALING JAYA: Datuk Seri Liow Tiong Lai has hit out at DAP again for strengthening PAS during the last two general elections.The MCA president said DAP was now blaming MCA for the Islamist party’s bid to enhance the Syariah Court’s powers.“When (former DAP national chairman) Karpal Singh was still alive, he openly chided DAP leaders on their mistaken stance on hudud law.“Now that Karpal has died, there is no one to keep both Lim Kit Siang and his son Guan Eng in check.“Not only do they not admit their mistakes, they are instead blaming MCA which has always taken a firm stance against the implementation of hudud law,” Liow said in a statement yesterday.PAS’ proposal to amend the Syariah Courts (Criminal Jurisdiction) Act 1965 (Act 355) seeks to enhance the maximum punishment that can be meted out by the Syariah Court.The amendments are thought to be PAS’ attempt to implement hudud law.Liow added that the biggest difference between DAP and MCA was the latter’s unwavering stance on the matter.He said DAP once promoted PAS’ supposed intentions to implement a welfare state.“In the pursuit of power, DAP betrayed and misled the Chinese community and was used by PAS. Now that PAS is stronger, it is able to discard DAP,” Liow said.He pointed out that it was PAS which first severed ties with DAP on June 3, 2015 and that DAP only reciprocated 13 days later.“Even though they have severed ties, DAP is still working with PAS in Selangor,” he said, adding that these were verifiable facts.Later, Liow told reporters that MCA would continue to oppose the amendments even if these were to be passed.
